div.pre: 1978 Torchiarolo, before 1931 (608) Burial: c. 270 B.C. (K) Contents: 130 AR Taras: st.; fr. (mostly Per. VII and VIII) Disposition: Lecce (Museo Castromediano) RassNum. 1931, p. 170 Noe names this hd. "Lecce, prov. of," but a letter to him from Dr. M. Bernardini of the Museo Castromediano, dated March 17, 1934, gives the provenance as Torchiarolo. Possibly part of the large Torchiarolo 1926 hd., no. 1977 above
